passive.name: Long Night
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. Increases DMG dealt by the wearer's Skill and Ultimate by <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. After the wearer uses Skill or Ultimate, gains Somnus Corpus. Upon triggering a Follow-up ATK, consumes Somnus Corpus, and increases DMG dealt by Follow-up ATK by <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong>.
